name: plating
content:

a thin layer of metal, especially gold or silver, that is put on top of something: gold/silver plating The gold medals have 6 grams of gold plating over a silver base. See
plate
More examplesFewer examplesThe gold plating is now getting a bit thin and tarnished and needs to be replaced.Along with its silver plating, the instrument still bears the name of its maker. The highest quality chrome plating covers all components.
